title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; identical API surface to the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and RAG.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (React/Flask) for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that adds readline history, markdown rendering, and prompt templates to Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement with inline autocomplete.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & asynchronous APIs, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation template using Ollama + ChromaDB + LangChain in under 100 lines.

title: ollama-nvidia-trt
summary: Upstream PR that adds optional TensorRT-LLM backend to Ollama for 2-3× faster inference on RTX 40 / A100.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Lightweight Discord.py bot that exposes Ollama chat, image, and model management commands to any server.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app providing Ollama chat & embedding REST endpoints with admin UI and API-key auth.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama with IAsyncEnumerable streaming, dependency-injection helpers, and Blazor sample.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that registers Ollama models as generators & embedders for production-grade pipelines.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; mirrors the Python/JS SDK and supports streaming, embeddings, and model ops.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio & serde.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Curated registry of user-contributed Modelfiles for CodeLlama, Vicuna, Zephyr, SQLCoder, etc. with one-line pull.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt.js Slack bot that adds /ollama slash command for private or channel-based chat with any local model.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that connects to Ollama via the Python SDK and adds side-by-side model comparison.
